channel.title: Burns on Elliot Snow-Kropla
channel.description: Recent content in Burns on Elliot Snow-Kropla

item.title: A Red, Red Rose
item.description: O my Luve's like a red, red rose That’s newly sprung in june; O my Luve's like the melodie That’s sweetly play'd in tune: As fair art thou, my bonnie lass, So deep in luve am I: And I will luve thee still, my dear, Till a’ the seas gang dry: Till a’ the seas gang dry, my dear, And the rocks melt wi’ the sun: I will luve thee still, my dear, While the sands o’ life shall run.
